locations.name: Bahen 1F
locations.long_description: The first floor of the Bahen Center is bustling with students heading to and from classes.

locations.name: Bahen 2F
locations.long_description: Second floor of Bahen Center. A quieter study space than the first floor, ideal for focused work.

locations.name: Bahen 3F
locations.long_description: Third floor of Bahen Center. Dedicated to research and collaborative projects.

locations.name: Dormitory
locations.long_description: Your dorm is filled with study notes, a laptop, and a cozy bed.

locations.name: Robarts Library
locations.long_description: You arrive Robarts Library, the largest library on campus. Towering bookshelves filled with knowledge surround the study desks.

locations.name: Convocation Hall
locations.long_description: Convocation Hall stands proudly, hosting lectures and ceremonies.

locations.name: Tim Hortons
locations.brief_description: A coffee shop popular among students.
locations.long_description: You arrive Tim Hortons, a coffee shop popular among students. It's a great place to grab a coffee before heading to class.

locations.name: King’s College Circle
locations.long_description: Popular King’s College Circle, a green and peaceful space at the heart of campus.

locations.name: Sidney Smith Hall
locations.long_description: Here is Sidney Smith Hall, students gather here for lectures and discussions.

locations.name: Hart House
locations.long_description: Here is Hart House, cultural and arts center, a peaceful retreat with art, music, and student events.

locations.name: UofT Bookstore
locations.brief_description: A shop for textbooks and merchandise.
locations.long_description: Welcome to UofT Bookstore, find all your academic needs and UofT apparel here. There seems to be something special here.

locations.name: Science Research Building
locations.long_description: Here is Science Research Building, labs and research spaces filled with eager students and professors.

items.name: USB_drive
items.description: The USB drive containing your project.

items.name: coffee
items.description: A hot cup of coffee from Tim Hortons.

items.name: notebook
items.description: A notebook from the UofT Bookstore. Something surprise will happen if you bring it to the right place.

items.name: library_card
items.description: A library card for accessing Robarts.

items.name: lab_key
items.description: A key to the research lab.

items.name: lucky_mug
items.description: Your lucky UofT mug, essential for submission.
